name: Answers not reviewed
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) should have reviewed the information you provided by ((review deadline date)) but they have not done so. Your joint application cannot be submitted until they have reviewed and confirmed it. 

#What you can do
They can still access the application. If they need more time then you can contact them and ask them review the information, if it is safe to do so. They have been sent an email telling them this. 

If you do not think they will review it, then you can make a sole application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)). In a sole application, your ((partner)) has to respond to the ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end a civil partnership)), after you have submitted it. 

You can create a sole application by signing into your account:  ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) has not been reviewed
